name: Color Square puzzle game
description:
Color Square puzzle game is one of the most interesting and fun addictive classic puzzle game! This game is a good brain trainer for you or for your friends.

Features:
- great HD graphics
- cool music and sfx effects
- 3 difficulty levels
- 60 levels
- automatic save game
- good animations
- and more..

Do you like brain teaser? You must try Color Square puzzle game!
